author: Vijay Lokapally
title: Coronavirus | Former cricketer Sukhvinder Singh recounts his rescue mission to Italy
content: When Prime Minister Narendra Modi applauded the efforts of Capt. Swati Rawal and Capt. Raja Chauhan of Air India Boeing 777 that airlifted 263 Indians, mostly students stranded in Rome, it was an appreciation to cherish for the crew of that historic flight on… [+1832 chars]
